MailTemplate.10001.3:
[Daring Adventure! The Ghost Ship Haunts the Deep] will end in 3 days!

Your hard-earned Squid Rice Crackers will expire after the event.

Be sure to visit the Event Shop before then to exchange them for rewards!
MailTemplate.10002.3:
[Daring Adventure! The Ghost Ship Haunts the Deep] has ended.

Any unused Squid Rice Crackers have been automatically converted into Dorra and sent to your guild warehouse. Please check your mail!
MailTemplate.10003.3:
[Daring Adventure! The Ghost Ship Haunts the Deep] has ended, and the claim period has expired.

But don’t worry—the Association has packed up your rewards and delivered them to your guild office. Please check your mail.

Don’t forget to claim your rewards on time next time!
MailTemplate.10101.3:
[Guild Sweet Guild] will end in {0} days!
Your hard-earned Glass Marbles will expire after the event.
Be sure to visit the Event Shop before then to exchange them for rewards!
MailTemplate.10102.3:
[Guild Sweet Guild] has ended.
Any unused Glass Marbles have been automatically converted into Dorra and sent to your guild warehouse. Please check your mail!
MailTemplate.10103.3:
The claim deadline has passed for [Guild Sweet Guild]!
Fortunately, the extremely considerate Association has packaged and mailed the rewards to your guild office. Please take a look.
Remember to claim your rewards after completing a mission next time!
MailTemplate.2011.3:
The packages can't hold the abundant supplies your guild has made!

Fortunately, the Association is extremely considerate and has mailed the extra rewards to your guild office. Please take a look.

Remember to organize your bag during your exploratory journeys!

MailTemplate.2092.3: Here are the rewards from A Finale Echoing challenges:
MailTemplate.2101.3:
It's time for the Trekker recruited last time to report in!
Please note that the Trekker has found your guild office on their own.
Be sure to recruit again once the next goal is achieved!
MailTemplate.3011.3:
Dear customer,

Your [Everbright Wishes] subscription will expire in 3 days. If you wish to renew, just contact me... Hehe, I look forward to continuing to serve you.
MailTemplate.3012.3:
Dear customer,

Your [Everbright Wishes] subscription expires today. If you wish to renew, contact me quickly... Hehe, thank you for your support!
MailTemplate.3013.3:
Dear Guild Representative

The Lucky Treasure Shovel event is ending in 3 days. All event items will be removed at the end of the event. Please plan your activities accordingly.

MailTemplate.5001.2: Thank You for Participating in the Survey!
MailTemplate.5001.3: Thank you so much for taking part in the survey! We've prepared a gift for you—please check your inbox.
MailTemplate.5002.3: We truly appreciate your support and have prepared the following gifts for you:
MailTemplate.90001.3: Hello there, renowned Tyrant!We have prepared a questionnaire to better understand your gaming experience in this beta test and to improve the quality of the game. You can find and participate in the questionnaire through "Questionnaire" at the bottom.Once you've completed the questionnaire, you will receive [Stellanite Dust x100]. Your feedback and suggestions during the beta test are highly appreciated, and we look forward to joining you on your adventure across Nova Continent as you make your wishes come true!
MailTemplate.90002.3: Hello there, renowned Tyrant!We have prepared a questionnaire to better understand your gaming experience in this beta test and to improve the quality of the game.
